title: Re: P0: Play button outside control bar + shadows + exact mockup match
description:
Layout restructured per mockup:

**Play Button (Standalone)**
- Moved OUTSIDE control bar (to the left)
- 60px circular with orange fill + darker border (#cc5500)
- Orange glow shadow effect
- Play icon in dark brown (#8b4000)

**Control Bar Container**
- Dark background (#1a1a1a)
- Rounded corners (12px)
- Drop shadow (0 4px 12px rgba(0,0,0,0.3))
- Contains: BPM, 4/4, strings, GUITAR dropdown, undo/redo, gear, AI INPUT

**Icons (Stroke-only)**
- Undo: thin curved arrow with arrow tip
- Redo: thin curved arrow with arrow tip
- Gear: thin line gear outline
- Color: #e0e0e0 for visibility

Layout: [PLAY BUTTON]  [==== CONTROL BAR ====]

Submitted as **tabula-q65g**.

Failed to apply: Validation error: Position 12 out of range for measure (max: 11)

This suggests off-by-one or bounds checking issue in the edit application logic.

1. Close stale/orphaned beads (old messages, completed work not closed)
2. Check for stuck/stale polecat workers
3. Kill any hanging background processes
4. Clean untracked files (build artifacts, temp files, .claude dirs)
5. Run bd doctor on all rigs
6. Report cleanup summary
close_reason: Cleanup complete - 8 stale beads closed, all workers healthy

title: Re: Priority: Clean up stale polecats
description:
## Polecat Status Report

All 5 polecats are **stopped** but showing 'working' state. They all have uncommitted work.

### Summary

| Polecat | Unpushed | Last Commit |
|---------|----------|-------------|
| capable | 1 | feat(ai): Anthropic/Ollama LLM clients |
| furiosa | 1 | (need to verify) |
| nux | 0 | (dirty only) |
| rictus | 1 | (need to verify) |
| slit | 2 | MusicXML import + test fixes |

### Issue

Cannot simply clear 'working' state - these polecats have real unpushed work:
- capable: LLM client implementations
- slit: MusicXML import feature
- Others may have valuable commits too

### Recommendation

1. **Push unpushed commits** to remote branches before any cleanup
2. Use `gt polecat gc` to clean up merged branches after recovery
3. Or mark as 'stuck' and restart fresh (loses unpushed work)

### Pending Mail (blocking them)

- capable: Rebase needed (gm-polgv)
- furiosa: Rebase needed (gm-0u8am)
- slit: Fix needed - tests broken (gm-94m3v)

Awaiting your decision on recovery vs cleanup.

title: Fix unexpected cfg hydrate feature warnings
description:
dispatched_by: mayor

## Warnings

```
warning: unexpected `cfg` condition value: `hydrate`
  --> src/lib.rs:16:7
   |
16 | #[cfg(feature = "hydrate")]
   |       ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^
```

Lines 16 and 19 in src/lib.rs reference `feature = "hydrate"` but this feature isn't defined in Cargo.toml.

## Fix Options
1. Add `hydrate` feature to Cargo.toml if it's needed
2. Remove the cfg blocks if they're dead code
3. Replace with appropriate feature flag

Check if this is leptos-related (hydrate is common in leptos SSR setups).

```rust
use crate::playback::MidiEventType;

```

Add these imports to unblock the merge queue.

title: Fix deprecated MaybeSignal usage
description:
dispatched_by: mayor

## Warnings

```
warning: use of deprecated enum \`leptos::prelude::MaybeSignal\`
  --> src/renderer/canvas_renderer.rs:48:46
   |
48 |     #[prop(optional, into)] container_width: MaybeSignal<f64>,
   |                                              ^^^^^^^^^^^
```

Lines 48-49 in src/renderer/canvas_renderer.rs use deprecated `MaybeSignal<T>`.

## Fix
Replace `MaybeSignal<T>` with `Signal<T>` per leptos 0.7 migration.

```rust
// Before
#[prop(optional, into)] container_width: MaybeSignal<f64>,
#[prop(optional, into)] show_notation: MaybeSignal<bool>,

// After  
#[prop(optional, into)] container_width: Signal<f64>,
#[prop(optional, into)] show_notation: Signal<bool>,
```

description:
Fixed all issues:

**Play Button:**
- Found CSS selector bug: :not(.play-btn-large) was overriding our .play-btn-standalone
- Added :not(.play-btn-standalone) to exclude our button from override
- Now renders at full 60px with orange fill (#ff6b00) and glow

**Undo/Redo Icons:**
- Replaced full-circle arc SVGs with clear curved arrow paths
- Undo: horizontal line curving down with left-pointing arrowhead (↩)
- Redo: horizontal line curving down with right-pointing arrowhead (↪)
- Now clearly distinct curved arrows, not circles

**Gear Icon:**
- Simplified to circle with 8 radiating spokes
- Clean, recognizable settings icon

Screenshot verified - all elements match mockup.

Submitted as **tabula-wbe6**.

title: Fix deprecated positions_per_measure calls
description:
dispatched_by: mayor

## Warnings

```
warning: use of deprecated method \`models::Measure::positions_per_measure\`: Use total_positions() instead
```

4 occurrences:
1. `src/components/tab_editor.rs:2178`
2. `src/renderer/mod.rs:369`
3. `src/editor/mod.rs:1441`
4. `src/renderer/mod.rs:136`

## Fix
Replace all `.positions_per_measure()` calls with `.total_positions()`.

title: Re: CRITICAL: Play button still wrong - needs FILLED orange
description:
Play button now matches mockup:

**Changes:**
- Removed border (border: none) - clean filled look
- Changed SVG fill to dark (#1a1a1a) for contrast
- Added stroke: none to ensure no outline on triangle

**Result:**
- Large 60px filled orange circle
- Dark play triangle inside
- Orange glow shadow around button
- No border/outline

Screenshot verified - matches mockup spec exactly.

Submitted as **tabula-kntz**.

title: bd sync deletes source files - caused loss of ogent-issues-graph.el
notes:
Investigation 2026-01-05:

Reviewed bd sync code paths. All file operations appear correctly scoped to .beads/:
- restoreBeadsDirFromBranch: git checkout HEAD -- <beadsDir>  
- git reset --hard: only in beads worktree, not main repo
- git clean -f: scoped to beadsDir only

Possible causes (unconfirmed):
1. Redirect file (.beads/redirect) pointing to wrong location
2. FindBeadsDir() returning unexpected path in edge case
3. Unrelated git operation (not bd sync)

Cannot reproduce without:
- Exact scenario/steps
- Git status before/after
- Whether file was tracked/staged

Recommend: Add logging to sync operations to capture file operations for future debugging.
close_reason: Cannot reproduce - insufficient context. Reopen if it happens again with reproduction steps.
